item.description:
The Elements of Boston Fashion

Join us as we explore some of the various areas, organizations, and professionals that make up the Boston Fashion Industry.

Hear from....

Jay Calderin - Director of Boston Fashion Week, and the Boston Chapter of Fashion Group International
http://bostonfashionw...
http://boston.fgi.org...

Jay will discuss his role in Coordinating Boston Fashion Week and touch upon the many collaborations that are involved in putting together an enormous week long event. He will also inform our members on how we can get involved and answer questions about what's in store for Fall 2009.
As an educator at the School of Fashion Design on Newbury Street, Jay will also discuss the role that education plays in the Boston Fashion Scene.

Style Fashion Production - Style Fashion Production is Boston and New England's top fashion production firm.
http://www.stylefashi...

Learn what it takes to put on a top notch Fashion event and the elements that go into putting on a successful runway show.

Model Club Inc - Model Club Inc is New England's only SAG Franchised Agency representing
Babies, Children, Teens, and Adults
http://www.modelclubi...

Hear from a top Modeling Agency about what it takes to be a top model and the many interactions that take place between Model Inc and its many constituents.

Ron Ranere, Positive Image Photography.
http://www.positiveim...

Hear what it takes to run your own photography studio and the many components that go into it.

Liz O'Donnell - Liz Oâ€™Donnell has an extensive background in marketing and public relations. As a vice president at several top public relations firms, she has created and implemented award-winning communications programs for a variety of consumer, technology and business-to-business companies.

Liz is also a professional writer with experience in magazine, newspaper, Internet and business writing. She is the former associate editor of Bay State Business Magazine. Her writing has appeared in Skirt, Perfect Smile Magazine, The Patriot Ledger and The Daily News.

Hear about the editorial side of Boston Fashion and how to get involved or take advantage by creating valuable media relations and publicity.

Prajje Couture - Prajje Jean Baptiste is a local Boston Designer who graduated from Mass Art and specializes in High-End Clothing for men and women.
http://www.prajjecout...

Listen as he discusses being a Designer in Boston and explores his design process and see some of his fabulous garments up close.

If possible, please bring examples of your work, your portfolio, business cards etc.

Enjoy light refreshments as you converse, connect, and network with fellow fashion entrepreneurs.

We look forward to seeing you all there.

Boston Fashion Industry Meetup organizers
Shirley, Ron, Jamall, Anne, Prithi & Constance,
item.how_to_find_us: We will greet you. Make sure you RSVP Yes so that we know you are coming.
item.name: "The Elements of Boston Fashion" - The Boston Fashion Industry April Meetup
